entry.title: WIND WARNING , Hinton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:13 AM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Jasper Warden Station 12:00 PM MST Monday 06 February 2023
Temperature: 3.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 43 %
Dewpoint: -7.6°C
Wind: ESE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 90 in wind prone areas. High plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Periods of snow near the British Columbia border. Amount 5 cm near the British Columbia border. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 90 in wind prone areas. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 06 February 2023
